title: ISic000268. I.Sicily inscription 000268
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) · M(anibus)
M(arcus) · Aemilius
Felicianus
scriba · pub(licus)
5fidelissimus
v(ixit) · a(nnis) · XLIII
Nonia Zosima
marito · b(ene) · m(erenti)

Apparatus criticus

Text based upon Bitto 2001 and CIL

English translation

To the shades of the underworld. Marcus Aemilius Felicianus, most trustworthy public scribe, died at 43 years. Nonia Zosima (erected this) for her well deserving husband.

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.6979 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • xvii https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029
